publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3442 Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh: Rise in Suicide Rates—That the Parliament notes with concern the rise in suicide rates and, in particular, the worrying rise in suicides amongst young people; commends the significant work that Facilitate (Scotland) has done in this area, providing counselling and support for those at risk from self-harm throughout Scotland and for their families, and notes that only strengthened communities and families will be able to support vulnerable people through personal crises, prevent those people from taking drastic action against themselves and enable them to regain control of their lives and their futures.
S1M-3442 Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Christine Grahame*
S1M-3442 Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-3442 Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) David McLetchie*, Murdo Fraser*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Phil Gallie*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Ben Wallace*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr David Davidson*, Mr Keith Harding*, John Scott*, Mary Scanlon*, John Young*

S1M-3442*#* Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh: Rise in Suicide Rates—That the Parliament notes with concern the rise in suicide rates and, in particular, the worrying rise in suicides amongst young people; commends the significant work that Facilitate (Scotland) has done in this area, providing counselling and support for those at risk from self-harm throughout Scotland and for their families, and notes that only strengthened communities and families will be able to support vulnerable people through personal crises, prevent those people from taking drastic action against themselves and enable them to regain control of their lives and their futures.Supported by: Christine Grahame, Mr Jamie Stone, David McLetchie, Murdo Fraser, Mr Murray Tosh, Phil Gallie, Alex Johnstone, Bill Aitken, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Ben Wallace, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr Brian Monteith, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Alex Fergusson, Mr David Davidson, Mr Keith Harding, John Scott, Mary Scanlon, John Young
S1M-3442# Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*
S1M-3442# Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3442# Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) David Mundell*
S1M-3442# Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-3442# Rise in Suicide Rates (lodged on 30 September 2002) Mr Kenneth Gibson*
